Articles.Content: Hello all! I'm not exactly new, been playing KSP for six months, but only now getting around to joining the forums. I should be trying to post images and albums soon.

Hello, sort of new player. I am a sort of old player, and I think others think they are sort of playing the game as well. 

Welcome to the forums. have fun, and if anyone picks on you, come and see me.... I won't protect you, I just wanna join in picking on the sort of noob player. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Hey there ejhawman, welcome to the forums! Folks are nice around these parts. Enjoy your time here.

Yep, just in case my first post leaves you wondering, I have a corny sense of humour.

I will await your photo albums with envious anticipation. I never seen to think about taking a screen shot... ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Going to try to post an album. Not sure if it's similar to posting a single image.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/9OVql)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-10T19:41:13Z" title="07/10/2015 07:41  PM" data-short="9 yr">July 10, 2015</time> by tetryds**
  
[IMGUR]9OVql[/IMGUR]
ejhawman, tetryds was nice enough to show you (and remind me) how to post Imgur albums on our forum. He left a note demonstrating the format.
Ah, thanks! I think I see it now.
